name: Dumagu | Construct 3
description:
Shepherd Games offers you the source code of Dumagu, a simple quest of a Frog to save his Queen.

Features

  • One source code to support multiple platforms
    • Android
    • iOS
    • Windows Phone
    • Windows Desktop
    • Mac
    • Linux
    • Facebook Instant Games
    • HTML
  • Made in Construct 3
  • No coding knowledge required
  • Easy to implement
  • Admob integration
  • To customize, simply update the global variables

Download folder contains

  • Construct 3 project file
  • HTML export
  • Guidelines with screenshots

For any support or queries, you may reach out to us at our Discord channel or write to contact@shepherd.games

If you don't want to purchase the Construct 3 subscription or have trouble with installation and customization, don't worry we will help you for a very low price.

Download Games Bundle | Source Codes | 2D Assets
